I attended an all-girls college. It's true. As a @pomonacollege student '78, I took a class at @scrippscollege . I also took classes at @CMCnews and @pitzercollege  That was the benefit of being a student in the Claremont Colleges.
RT @TSLnews: Claremont McKenna College will announce a decision on whether students will return to campus for the spring 2021 semester by D…
RT @TSLnews: Claremont McKenna College will announce a decision on whether students will return to campus for the spring 2021 semester by D…
Claremont McKenna College will announce a decision on whether students will return to campus for the spring 2021 semester by Dec. 9, @CMCnews President Hiram Chodosh said Monday.

In the meantime (this is a substantial email): @CMCnews has reduced operational budgets and executive salaries/retirement benefits. It has "drawn on the strong financial resources of the College to cover additional, significant funding gaps."

If students return to @CMCnews: there are plans for "rigorous screening, frequent testing, smart tracing, and diligent cleaning capabilities; single-room residential capacity; expanded, smart dining options; ample isolation and quarantine housing; and on-site medical support."
Spring Update: @CMCnews students can expect a final decision on whether they will return to campus for SP21 by Dec. 9, Chodosh says.
RT @HeeterMaria: INBOX: Claremont McKenna College will temporarily furlough workers in December if students do not return in the spring, pe…
INBOX: Claremont McKenna College will temporarily furlough workers in December if students do not return in the spring, per a Monday email from @cmcnews president Hiram Chodosh.
